boat.construction_details: GRP hull, timber deck and fitout.
boat.full_description: 4 x Kattegat 26 hulls were produced by Jim Spencer at Waterside Boatyard Brightlingsea during the 1990's. " Complete boats "Sula" and "Widgeon" and 2 bare hulls for owner completion. Grey Seal's hull is number 5 and probably the last hull has been fitted out by shipwright Josh Brooks and her first owner Michael Breese 2018/19.
boat.name: Grey Seal

ownerships.note: Michael Breese has owned the hull since 2009.
ownerships.text: Michael Breese has owned the hull since

boat.short_description: Grey Seal is a Kattegat 26, hull number 5, completed in 2018-2019.
